# Marquel Yvette Photography

> Loudoun County's premier headshot photographer specializing in professional headshots for executives, corporate teams, LinkedIn profiles, realtors, actors, and medical professionals. Based in South Riding, Virginia, serving the entire DC Metropolitan area including Loudoun and Fairfax Counties.

Marquel Yvette Photography is a luxury headshot studio owned and operated by Marquel Forbes. The studio is known for helping camera-shy professionals feel comfortable and confident in front of the camera, transforming the typically uncomfortable photography experience into a relaxed, enjoyable session.

Key information:
- Studio located in South Riding, VA (Loudoun County), less than 1 mile from Route 50
- Serves clients throughout the DC Metro area including Reston, McLean, Great Falls, and Washington DC
- Sessions typically last one hour with up to 3 outfit changes
- Photos delivered within 7-10 business days via secure online gallery
- On-location corporate photography available for teams and conferences

## Services

- [Rates & Availability](https://www.marquelyvette.com/rates-2): Current pricing, session packages, and online booking for all headshot services
- [Workplace Headshots](https://www.marquelyvette.com/workplace-headshots): On-location corporate team photography with portable studio setup for offices and conferences
- [Request a Proposal](https://www.marquelyvette.com/request-proposal): Custom quotes for corporate events, team sessions, and high-volume headshot needs
- [Gift Cards](https://www.marquelyvette.com/gift-cards): Never-expire photography gift cards delivered instantly via email

- [Homepage](https://www.marquelyvette.com/): Overview of services, client testimonials, studio information, and FAQ
